name: Webnovel Light - PrivateBin Sites
description:
Makes PrivateBin sites display similar to webnovel.com by qidian. Light Format.
Sites include: 
    https://paste.imirhil.fr/
    https://jaegers.net/apps/privatebin/
    https://privatebin.net/
    https://paste.warth-hofer.de/
    https://plexle.fi/
    https://paste.fizi.ca/
    https://vim.cx/
additional_info:
v0.3

IMPORTANT (Installation): If you wish to use on Mozilla Firefox DO NOT install the stylish extension, install https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/styl-us/ instead. Then proceed to download/install themes from the links above. For chrome you can just go to the links and install stylish and download/install the themes.

5/5/2018 - Reduced left and right padding of section container to 3%.
6/10/2018 - Added paste.fizi.ca, paste.warth-hofer.de, jaegers.net/apps/privatebin, privatebin.net, plexle.fi domains and rules for overriding collections of chapters styles.
24/11/2018 - Added vim.cx domain.
